sen.j: コロッケは、揚げ物料理の一種である。
sen.e: Korokke is a kind of deep fried dish.
Korokke is a kind of deep fried dish.
Korokke is a kind of deep fried dish.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: ホワイトソース（ベシャメルソース）や茹でたジャガイモを潰したものを俵型や小判型に丸め、小麦粉、鶏卵、パン粉を衣としてつけ、ラードや油で揚げたもの。
sen.e: To cook korokke, cream sauce (sauce béchamel) or boiled and mashed potatoes are shaped flat and oval patties, coated with flour, egg and panko (bread crumb) and deep fried in hot lard or cooking oil.

To cook korokke, cream sauce (sauce béchamel) or boiled and mashed potatoes are shaped into flat and oval patties, coated with flour, egg and panko (bread crumbs) and deep fried in hot lard or cooking oil.

To cook korokke, cream sauce (sauce béchamel) or boiled and mashed potatoes are shaped into flat and oval patties, coated with flour, egg and panko (bread crumbs) and deep fried in hot lard or cooking oil.

sen.j: 挽肉や蟹肉など魚介類やタマネギのみじん切り等野菜を加熱し混ぜる場合が多い。
sen.e: It is often the case that cooked ground meat, crab meat, seafood or chopped vegetables including chopped onions are combined and mixed in precooked white cream or mashed potatoes.
sen.cmt: 下の表現を追加しました。"in precooked white cream or mashed potatoes"
sen.e: It is often the case that cooked ground meat, crab meat, seafood or chopped vegetables including chopped onions are combined and mixed in precooked white cream or mashed potatoes.
It is often the case that cooked ground meat, crab meat, seafood or chopped vegetables including chopped onions are combined and mixed in precooked white cream or mashed potatoes.

sen.j: 現在の日本では、コロッケは一般的な家庭の味となっている。
sen.e: Korokke is currently an ordinary home-made dish in Japan.
Korokke is currently an ordinary home-made dish in Japan.
Korokke is currently an ordinary home-made dish in Japan.

sen.j: ウスターソース等をかけて食べる洋食料理であり、精肉店で持ち帰り用惣菜として販売されている極めて庶民的な惣菜でもある。
sen.e: Korokke is a Western cuisine to be tasted with Worcester sauce, etc. for seasoning, and also available for takeout at meat shops, so it can be said to be a really inexpensive popular dish.
Korokke is a Western cuisine to be tasted with Worchestershire sauce etc. for seasoning, and it is also available for takeout at meat shops. It is a really inexpensive, popular dish.
Korokke is a Western style cuisine to be eaten with Worchestershire sauce etc. for seasoning, and it is also available for takeout at butchers, and it is a really inexpensive, popular dish.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 揚げたてが格段に美味しく、1960年代以前は子供が揚げたてのコロッケを買ってその場でおやつに食べる風景も見られた。
sen.e: Korokke which is right out of the hot oil is particularly delicious, and before the 1960's there was a scene of children getting freshly-fried korokke at a shop and eating it for a snack there.
Korokke right out of the hot oil is particularly delicious, and before the 1960's children often ate freshly-fried korokke at shops for a snack.
Korokke right out of the hot oil is particularly delicious, and before the 1960's children often ate freshly-fried korokke at shops for a snack.

sen.j: 豚カツなど他のカツレツ、フライ料理と同種の料理法だが、既に中身に火が通っているため二度揚げする必要はない。
sen.e: The method of cooking korokke is very similar to pork cutlets and other cutlets and deep fried dishes, but korokke body is precooked and unnecessary to be deep fried twice.
The method of cooking korokke is very similar to pork cutlets and other cutlets and deep fried dishes, but the korokke body is precooked and it is not necessary to deep fry it twice.
The method of cooking korokke is very similar to pork cutlets and other cutlets and deep fried dishes, but the korokke body is precooked and it is not necessary to deep fry it twice.

sen.j: コロッケ用にはでんぷん質が多い男爵イモが食味の点で適している。
sen.e: Danshaku potatoes (a type of potato) are perfect for korokke in taste because this type of potatoes contains lots of starch.
Danshaku potatoes (a type of potato) are perfectly suitable in taste for korokke because this type of potato contains a lot of starch.
Danshaku potatoes (a type of potato) are perfectly suitable in taste for korokke because this type of potato contains a lot of starch.

sen.j: 肉をアピールするときはミートコロッケ、じゃがいもをアピールするときはポテトコロッケと呼ぶこともあるがほぼ同一のものである。
sen.e: If meat should be appealed, it can be named meat korokke, and if potatoes should be appealed, it can be named potato korokke, but both are almost the same.
If meat should be used, it can be named meat korokke, and if potatoes should be used, it can be named potato korokke, but both are almost the same.
If meat should be used, it can be named meat korokke, and if potatoes should be used, it can be named potato korokke, but both are almost the same.

sen.j: その他の物としては、グリーンピースやニンジンなどを混ぜた野菜コロッケ、ジャガイモでなくカボチャを用いて甘味を持たせたカボチャコロッケもある。
sen.e: Also, there are vegetable korokke combined with green peas or carrots and sweeter pumpkin korokke using pumpkin for a substitute of potatoes.
Also, there are vegetable korokke combined with green peas or carrots, as well as sweeter pumpkin korokke that uses pumpkin as a substitute for potatoes.
Also, there are vegetable korokke combined with green peas or carrots, as well as sweeter pumpkin korokke that uses pumpkin as a substitute for potatoes.

sen.j: ホワイトソースを使ったものはクリームコロッケと呼ばれ、「カニクリームコロッケ」、「えびクリームコロッケ」、「コーンクリームコロッケ」など具材の名が冠されることもある。
sen.e: When white sauce is used, it is called cream korokke, and there are 'crab cream korokke', 'shrimp cream korokke' and 'corn cream korokke' whose names have the name of ingredients in the first part of the korokke names.

When white sauce is used, it is called cream korokke, and there are 'crab cream korokke', 'shrimp cream korokke' and 'corn cream korokke' whose names have the name of ingredients in the first part of the korokke names.
When white sauce is used, it is called cream korokke, and these include 'crab cream korokke,' 'shrimp cream korokke' and 'corn cream korokke.'
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。クォーテーションの位置を変えました。

sen.j: また潰したジャガイモに味をつけることもあり、カレー味のカレーコロッケ、醤油と味醂の下味をつけた肉じゃがコロッケなどが見受けられる。
sen.e: It is sometimes the case that mashed potatoes get flavored such as curry korokke which is tasted curry and "nikujaga (a simmered dish of potatoes and beef which is flavored with soy sauce and mirin (cooking sweet sake)) korokke."

Sometimes the mashed potatoes are flavored, such as with curry korokke which tastes like curry and nikujaga (a simmered dish of potatoes and beef which is flavored with soy sauce and mirin [cooking sweet sake]) korokke.
Sometimes the mashed potatoes are flavored, such as with curry korokke and nikujaga (a simmered dish of potatoes and beef which is flavored with soy sauce and mirin (cooking sweet sake)) korokke.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 豚カツ同様、盛り付けの際に千切りキャベツを付け合わせとして盛ることも多い。
sen.e: As well as pork cutlets, it is often the case to place korokke on a plate together with shredded cabbages for garnish.
As well as pork cutlets, it is often the case to place korokke on a plate garnished with shredded cabbage.
Korokke are often served on a plate garnished with shredded cabbage, in the same way as pork cutlets.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: コロッケ単体ではなく、料理に加えて使用する例も多々見られる。
sen.e: There are many cases that korokke is added to other dishes as well as the independent serving of korokke.
There are many cases that korokke is added to other dishes as well as the sole serving of korokke.
Korokke are sometimes added to other dishes or served alone.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: たとえば、コッペパンなどに挟んだサンドイッチはコロッケパン、蕎麦やうどんにコロッケをのせたものはコロッケ蕎麦・コロッケうどん、カレーライスにのせたものはコロッケカレーと呼ばれる。
sen.e: For example, a long ban with korokke sandwiched is called korokke pan (bread), soba and udon noodles with korokke on top are called korokke soba noodle and korokke udon noodle, and curry and rice with korokke on top is called korokke curry.

For example, long bread sandwiching korokke is called korokke pan (bread), soba and udon noodles with korokke on top are called korokke soba noodles and korokke udon noodles, and curry and rice with korokke on top is called korokke curry.

For example, korokke in sandwiches are called korokke pan (bread), soba and udon noodles with korokke on top are called korokke soba noodles and korokke udon noodles, and curry and rice with korokke on top is called korokke curry.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペル修正しました。

sen.j: 日本のイタリア料理店でライスコロッケと呼ばれる米のコロッケは、シチリア名物のアランチーニという料理である。
sen.e: Rice-made korokke which is called rice korokke in Italian restaurants in Japan is a dish called arancini which is very popular in Sicilia.
Rice-made korokke which is called rice korokke in Italian restaurants in Japan is a dish called arancini which is very popular in Sicily.
Korokke made from rice and found in Italian restaurants in Japan originated with a dish called arancini which is very popular in Sicily.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 「コロッケ」の起源の有力説として、フランス料理の付け合せであった（クロケット）起源説がある。
sen.e: According to one of the prevailing opinions, 'korokke' originated from a croquette which used to be a side dish for French cuisine.
According to one of the prevailing opinions, 'korokke' originated from a croquette which is used as a side dish for French cuisine.
It is thought that 'korokke' originated from croquettes which are used as a side dish in French cuisine.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: フランスのクロケットはミンチにした魚肉やとり肉などを混ぜたクリームコロッケに近い物が主流である。
sen.e: Main kind of croquette in France is one which is similar to cream korokke laced with ground fish or chicken meat.
Main kind of croquette in France are similar to cream korokke laced with ground fish or chicken.
Croquette in France are similar to cream korokke filled with ground fish or chicken.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: ただしジャガイモをつぶした物にパン粉をまぶして揚げて作ったクロケットのレシピも見いだされる。
sen.e: There is also a recipe for cooking croquette in a way that mashed potatoes are coated with bread crumb and deep fried.
There is also a recipe for cooking croquette in a way that mashed potatoes are coated with bread crumbs and deep fried.
There is also a recipe for cooking croquette in a way that mashed potatoes are coated with bread crumbs and deep fried.

sen.j: またオランダにも（クロケット）と呼ばれる料理があり、こちらはホワイトソースでできたもののほか、ジャガイモで作られたものもあり、ジャガイモコロッケの起源ではないかとの憶測があるが、フランスからオランダにクロケットが伝播したのが1909年とされ、日本のコロッケの普及時期に比するとオランダ伝来と考えるだけの信憑性は薄い。
sen.e: There is a dish called croquette in Netherland too, one of which is white sauce-based type and another of which is potato-based type, and it has been speculated that potato korokke might originate in that potato-based type, but it was the year 1909 when croquette was introduced from France to Netherland, and it is not highly credible to believe potato korokke was brought from Netherland into Japan, judging from the period that korokke first appeared and was gaining popularity in Japan.
sen.cmt: "（日本の）ジャガイモコロッケの起源ではないか"：「日本の」を追加したほうがmake senseに感じられますが、定かでないので加えませんでした。
sen.e: There is a dish called croquette in the Netherlands also, one of which is a white sauce-based type and another which is a potato-based type, and it has been speculated that potato korokke might originate in that potato-based type. However, it was the year 1909 when croquette was introduced from France to the Netherlands, and it is not feasible to believe that potato korokke was brought from the Netherlands to Japan, judging from the period that korokke first appeared and was gaining popularity in Japan.

There is a dish called croquette in the Netherlands also, one of which is a white sauce-based type and another which is a potato-based type, and it has been speculated that potato korokke might have originated in that potato-based type; however, it was the year 1909 when croquette was introduced from France to the Netherlands, and it is not likely that potato korokke was brought from the Netherlands to Japan, judging from the period that korokke first appeared and was gaining popularity in Japan.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペル修正し、1文にしました。

sen.j: 小説家、村井弦斎がに発表した当時の大ベストセラー「食道楽」秋の巻153ページにコロッケのレシピが掲載されている。
sen.e: Best seller of those days, 'Shoku doraku (gourmandize)' which was authored by a novelist, Gensai MURAI, carries a korokke recipe on page 153 of the autumn issue of that magazine.
The best seller of those days, 'Shoku doraku (gourmandize)' which was authored by the novelist, Gensai MURAI, carries a korokke recipe on page 153 of the autumn issue of that magazine.

sen.j: には益田太郎冠者の作詞した『コロッケの唄』が大流行し、大正時代にはカレーライス、豚カツと並び三大洋食として既に人気があったとされる。
sen.e: "Korokke Song" written by MASUDA Taro Kaja, a lyricist was a big hit and korokke had gained popularity in the Taisho Period as one of the three top European dishes as well as curry and rice and pork cutlet.

sen.e: "Korokke Song" written by MASUDA Taro Kaja, a lyricist was a big hit and korokke had gained popularity in the Taisho Period as one of the three top European dishes along with curry and rice, and pork cutlets.

Korokke Song written by the lyricist Taro Kaja MASUDA, was a big hit and korokke gained popularity in the Taisho Period as one of the three top European dishes along with curry and rice, and pork cutlets.

sen.j: 、ヤヨイ食品の企画によりコロッケのキャンペーンソング「コロッケのうた」（作詞：礼空トオル、作曲：青木隆、歌：やよいちゃん）がシングルコンパクトディスクで発売された。

sen.j: 揚げる寸前のコロッケを冷凍し、揚げるだけの状態にして売られており、簡単に作る事が出来る。
sen.e: There is a pre-fried frozen korokke on sale, so it is easy and quick to serve korokke for meals without taking time.
There is pre-fried frozen korokke on sale, so serving korokke with meals has become quick and easy.

sen.j: 冷凍食品の売上No.1を記録している。
sen.e: Korokke has boasted the top sales in the frozen foods area.
Korokke has boasted top sales in the frozen foods area.

sen.e: (As of the year 2007)
(As of the year 2007)

sen.j: 凍ったまま揚げてしまうと外側の衣部分と内側のジャガイモ部分との温度差により破裂したり、解けかかったコロッケをうっかり箸でさわってしまい、中身が出てきてしまう失敗をする可能性がある。
sen.e: There is a risk of mess-up like when deep frying frozen korokke, the korokke may blow up due to the different temperatures of the outside coating and inside potatoes, or upon unintentional touch of thawing korokke by chopsticks, the inside part may come out.

There is a risk of mess-ups like when deep frying frozen korokke, the korokke may blow up due to differing temperatures of the outside coating and the potatoes inside, or upon accidentally touching thawing korokke with chopsticks--the inside part may come out.

When deep frying frozen korokke, the korokke may burst due to differing temperatures of the outside coating and the potatoes inside, or they may break up if accidentally touched with chopsticks while they are thawing.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: これを避けるには、大量のコロッケを入れると油の温度が下がるため適量を入れるようにする事。
sen.e: To prevent such problems from occurring, it is important to put an appropriate number of frozen korokke into hot oil because too many korokke may reduce the temperature of the oil.
To prevent such problems from occurring, it is important to put an appropriate number of frozen korokke into hot oil because too many korokke may reduce the temperature of the oil.
To prevent such problems from occurring, it is important to put an appropriate number of frozen korokke into the hot oil because too many korokke may reduce the temperature of the oil.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: または凍ったコロッケを電子レンジで解凍加熱して、揚げるときは衣の色をつけるだけにするとよい。
sen.e: If deep frying frozen korokke which has been thawed and cooked using an electric oven, all you have to do is to make the outside coating brown.
If deep frying a frozen korokke that has been thawed using a microwave oven, only the outside coating needs to be browned.
If deep frying a frozen korokke that has been thawed using a microwave oven, only the outside coating needs to be browned.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 近年は健康やダイエットの面から油の使いすぎを考慮し、オイルスプレーで油をかけオーブントースターやオーブンで焼き上げる方法もとられる。
sen.e: In recent years, people are cautious about the excessive consumption of cooking oil for good health or diet, and there is a way available to spray cooking oil over frozen korokke using a cooking spay and cook the sprayed frozen korokke in a toaster or electric oven.

In recent years, people are cautious about the excessive consumption of cooking oil for good health or diet, and there is a way available to spray cooking oil over frozen korokke using a cooking spray and cook the sprayed frozen korokke in a toaster or electric oven.

In recent years, people are cautious about the health effects of excessive consumption of cooking oil, and there is a way available to spray cooking oil over frozen korokke using a cooking spray and cook the sprayed frozen korokke in a toaster or electric oven.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: また、電子レンジで温めるだけで、カリッと揚げた食感を再現できる冷凍コロッケも開発されている。
sen.e: In addition, there is a new type of developed frozen korokke, and the crisp-fried texture of such korokke can be realized just by heating up by an electric oven.
In addition, there is a new type of developed frozen korokke; the korokke can attain a crisp-fried texture just by heating it up in an electric oven.
In addition, there is a new type of frozen korokke which can be made crisp just by heating it up in a microwave.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。
